value:
$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|Time is cruel, isn't it,
$Nu?$k$pNow...goodbye.$k$p$Sbs5000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$Fi2000|...$k$pMidgard, the world of mortals...
is no more.$k$pThe curse of the Golden Seer
has reached its completion.$k$pNow, the cycle begins anew...$k$pMy child, my creation...my daughter...
will come into being...now.$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$pWhere...where am I?$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|Welcome, Heiðr—my daughter,
my...other half.$k$pWith you, I will become what I am
now: Gullveig, the Golden Seer.$k$pI am sending you into the past,
where you will meet Seiðr and
you will live as sisters...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$Fi2000|And with that done, I will go far, far
into the past...so far my mind and
body forget their truths.$k$pAnd from that nascent form,
I will return...in time.$k$pGullveig...the Golden Seer...
an eternal cycle, unending.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I have no time to fight. I must
complete my mission...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Kvasir is trying to escape!
Stay after her!$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If she was telling the truth, then
Kvasir will grow up to become
Gullveig one day...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's right. And then she unwound
time and sent her younger self into
the past as Kvasir...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait...$k$pIf Kvasir were to not exist in the past,
Gullveig wouldn't exist the future...$k$pAnd if Gullveig were to not exist
in the future, Kvasir wouldn't exist
either...right?$k$pEr...I feel like my head is being
tied in knots...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is starting to feel like a question
of whether the chicken or the egg
came first...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|These paradoxes are the product
of exerting control over time...$k$pNot even a goddess can easily
navigate the contradictions.$k$pFor now, our best course of action
is to follow Kvasir.$k$p$Sbs150|
